explains: adv. 精巧地；苦心经营地

sentences.en: It was clearly an elaborately planned operation.
sentences.cn: 这显然是一次经过周密策划的行动。

sentences.en: Now appeared Joe Harper, as airily clad and elaborately armed as Tom.
sentences.cn: 这时，乔·哈帕出现了，他和汤姆一样，轻装上阵，武器精良。

sentences.en: They were richly gilt, and their lofty prows and sterns were elaborately carved.
sentences.cn: 它们都漆成富丽的金色，高大的船头和船尾都是精雕细琢的。
